title: Slender - The Arrival [NPUB31410] [PS3 - PSN]
description:
Experience the fear all over again. Slender: The Arrival is the official re-imagining of the original release that once again will engage players with the same terrifying gameplay, while adding a complete gaming experience that the fans have been asking for.

The Arrival features true survival horror gameplay; forcing players to explore human emotions in an unsettling, haunting world. This is a game about survival -- use your instincts to get out alive. The Arrival pushes gamers further over the edge past what they experienced in the first game with more levels and improved visuals accompanying its engaging storyline.
